toolTipItems: Save 85% of their ammunition and runes
Unlimited run energy
Quadruple HP restore rate
Automatically bury bones
Quadruple bone bury xp
Ensouled heads drop two at a time
Triple resources from Mining, Fishing, Woodcutting, harvesting herbs, blast mine and farming contracts
Triple Molch pearls from Aerial Fishing
Farming ticks will occur every minute instead of every five minutes
All supply crates from Wintertodt and resources gathered from Mining, Fishing, Woodcutting, Farming and blast mine are automatically banked
Players can choose their farming contract and Slayer task
Double xp in Smithing, Cooking, Firemaking, Herblore, Fletching, Crafting and Construction
This stacks with any existing experience multipliers
Double xp in Mining, Fishing, Woodcutting, Hunter, Thieving, Farming and Runecraft
This stacks with any existing experience multipliers
Double xp in Attack, Strength, Defence, Hitpoints, Magic, Ranged and Prayer
This stacks with any existing experience multipliers
Wintertodt's attacks do no damage
Wintertodt's attacks no longer interrupt a player's actions
Triple loot from supply crates
10% increased accuracy and damage for all attack styles
30% if the monster is part of an active Slayer task
NPCs that drop clue scrolls now have a flat 1/10 chance of dropping them
Clue geodes, nests and bottles are now found ten times more often from all skilling activities from which they can be found
All un-started clues are stackable
All clues have the lowest number of steps possible for their tier
Attack speed of all weapons are sped up by 1, including magic spells
Special attacks with instant attacks such as the dragon thrownaxe are unaffected
Players take 50% less damage from all monsters
Prayer is restored at a rate of 1 point every 3.6 seconds
Double xp from all skills
This stacks with any existing experience multipliers
